notFoundPage.notFound: It looks like we can't find this page. Please check the entered url.
notFoundPage.toWelcomePage: Take a look at Welcome page

passResetModal.successText: Check your email to reset your password.

rsschoolSection.text: This is not just another community of developers, this is something more.

welcomeSection.title: What is GraphiQL?
welcomeSection.text: GraphiQL is the GraphQL integrated development environment (IDE). It’s a powerful (and all-around awesome) tool you’ll use often while building Gatsby websites. It offers syntax highlighting, intellisense autocompletion, automatic documentation, and much more.
welcomeSection.text2: Use GraphiQL to interactively build your page and static queries.

nameInput.namePattern: *Enter your firs name and last name with capital letters first - Jonh Dow
nameInput.label: Name

passwordInput.label: Password
passwordInput.passwordPattern: *Password should contain at least one number, one letter and one special character
passwordInput.defaultHelper: *One number, one letter and one special character

repeatPassInput.label: Repeated password
repeatPassInput.passwordPattern: *Password should contain at least one number, one letter and one special character

errorMessages.emailAlreadyExists: The provided email is already in use by an existing user. Each user must have a unique email.
errorMessages.idTokenExpired: The provided Firebase ID token is expired.
errorMessages.idTokenRevoked: The Firebase ID token has been revoked.
errorMessages.internalError: The Authentication server encountered an unexpected error while trying to process the request. Please, try again.
errorMessages.invalidDisplayName: The provided value for the displayName user property is invalid. It must be a non-empty string.
errorMessages.invalidEmail: The provided value for the email user property is invalid. It must be a string email address.
errorMessages.wrongPassword: The provided password for this user is incorrect. Please, try again.
errorMessages.userNotFound: There is no existing user record matching the provided ID. Please check your email.
errorMessages.emailAlreadyInUse: User with that email is allready exists! Please, check your email or use another one.
errorMessages.tooManyRequests: There`s too many requests for now. Please, try again later.
errorMessages.default: Some unexpected error occured! Please, try again.

editor.queryPlaceholder: Enter your GraphQL request or reed the documentation
